p:
Indigenous Australians have a higher prevalence of type 2 diabetes than non-Indigenous Australians: Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander adults are 3·5 times more likely than non-Indigenous adults to have diabetes. 179, 231 69% of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people older than 18 years were considered to be overweight (29%) or obese (40%) in 2012–13, and this likelihood was 1·2 times more than in non-Indigenous adults.
232
